doc.plot: When pain and love collide...deceased person, coroner required. Lily and John have a perfect love. The kind you only find in the movies. The kind you hope to experience but rarely do. With video love letters and kindnesses throughout her day, John expresses his love for his wife and the overwhelming joy she brings him. But what happens when an 11-44 call goes out on a loved one? Can you pick up the pieces?
